extendedInfo.description: Experience the action of your favorite sport like never before! Watch matches come to life with vibrant graphics and ultra-realistic animations. ** This is a big game, so we strongly recommend connecting to WiFi before downloading. We promise â itâs worth it! **REAL PLAYERS, REAL TEAMS, REAL LEAGUES Featuring over 22 officially licensed leagues, 500+ licensed teams and more than 15,000 players. Take to the pitch with superstars like Kaka, Wayne Rooney, Gerard PiquÃ©, Karim Benzema and more. From the English Premiership and La Liga, to the German Bundesliga and beyond â dominate your league and march toward glory in 32 authentic stadiums. MATCH DAY MADNESSCapture the passion and power of the worldâs most popular sport with unprecedented authenticity. This is the deepest, most visually striking football title ever. Feel every thrill on the pitch with your heroes, anytime, anywhere.FANCY FOOTWORK New control schemes let you handle the ball with greater precision than ever before. Master free kicks and penalty shots with full touch control. Get in the game with realistic 360Â° player movement and gesture-driven skill moves. Pull off defense-splitting passes, rifling shots, penalty kicks, and pro-style tricks.Football is life! Now live it to the fullest with the ONLY officially licensed FIFA game on Android! Discover more games from EA like NBA JAM by EA SPORTSâ¢, The Simsâ¢ FreePlay, and Real Racing 2. See all our games for Android now!Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips, and more!VISIT US: http://www.ea.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesEnd User License Agreement: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/Android/

reviews.title: Best of the best...
reviews.comment: No matter what game I play on my galaxy nexus, I just keep coming back to the best football game available in the market. Excellent job EA sports. Badly waiting for \'13.
reviews.author: Talha Riaz

reviews.title: Team score table names and jersey mismatches
reviews.comment: Does not look like the team tables match the players. Manvhaster United is one of them. Excellent game otherwise. Until the team tables and jerseys are fixed though its a 3 star rating from me.
reviews.author: Michael Donnel

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Got this during the $0.25 Google Plus sale. After playing it, I\'d agree that it\'s definitely worth the normal, full price. It\'s full-on FIFA (sans Manager mode) for Android. Runs great, looks great and they somehow pulled off the control very well. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t play.
reviews.comment: Will not d/l additional content properly. Either stops halfway or just gives me an error. Have tried 20+ times uninstalling and re installing. I give up. Thankfully only paid $0.25 for this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work for my phone
reviews.comment: The game I hear is amazing but it just doesn\'t work for my phone. It is a sony,  may you please fix this?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: I buy this app & I can\'t play a game ....also don\'t load any screen ...explain ..press to play a quick game & the charge bar goin to the half & the game force close.please fix this app to I can play on my sony tablt s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Moga Pro
reviews.comment: EA games would be awsome with the moga controller. This game would be a better experience with it.
reviews.author: Steven Meza

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: This game awesome definatly worth the price. And awesome game play. It takes along time to fully download the game but worth it.
reviews.author: Rami Sam

reviews.title: Really Impressive!
reviews.comment: Currently using Samsung S3 with this game. Great graphics and no lagging. Takes about a gig of hard drive space, but really worth it. To be honest this game is equally comparable to the version for PSP.
reviews.author: Huruy Woldemicael

reviews.title: So mad
reviews.comment: I bought that game and I can\'t  download it ,, plzz fix it .. I got a Samsung tab 3 ,, fix it ,, or give me my $ 7 back ,,
reviews.author: luc maitre

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: I want a boxing game from you guys. . Why is it that (Apple) Has one from you guys and android don\'t have it?  I want \"fight night\". ..
reviews.author: Jose Guerra

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on galaxy Nexus..  Country gate error
reviews.comment: Please update game so I can play. When loading game, country gate error pops up and game will close right after.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing game.....but
reviews.comment: Works perfect on my nexus 7. Only complaint I have is that I wish you could manage club mode. I uninstalled because it gets stale. Add this feature and I\'d play it all day long! And give you 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH NEXUS 4??
reviews.comment: What a shame! Such a brilliant game. Played perfectly on my N7. Now I cannot install it on my N4. Such disappointment!
reviews.author: Ankush Kochhar

reviews.title: Seriously WTF not compatible with N4
reviews.comment: I cannot fathom how a company does not make a game compatible with the plain vanilla version of Android. I have about five games I purchased from EA that no longer work with one of the newest most powerful phones. Really amateurish.
reviews.author: Luke Bovill

reviews.title: Not available on the HTC One
reviews.comment: Bought this and loved it with my S2...now I have a phone that can actually handle this and I cant play it....fix this pls
reviews.author: Phil Brangers

reviews.title: Good Game
reviews.comment: Enjoyed playing this game, however suddenly cannot download it on to my phone. I get a server error message
reviews.author: Robert Poulton

reviews.title: Can\'t believe I paid for this.
reviews.comment: I don\'t mind the game itself. Nothing amazing, but it\'s fun. But 90% of the time the game crashes or causes my phone to freeze. Waste of money for Droid X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fifa12!!
reviews.comment: Finally got it play on my galaxy nexus and let\'s say that I love it. Close console play!! Keep it up EA.
reviews.author: A Google User
